properties.areaDesc: Caribbean Waters of Puerto Rico from 10 NM to 17N; Coastal Waters of Southern USVI, Vieques, and Eastern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 15 at 1:56AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
Thunderstorms with cloud-to-ground lightning are moving slowly
westward between Saint Croix and Saint Thomas. The thunderstorms
will contain brief heavy rain and gusty winds to 30 knots. These
thunderstorms are expected to approach the waters around Vieques
by around 3 AM AST.

Monitor NOAA Weather Radio for the latest
information...forecasts...and warnings.

NWSheadline: THUNDERSTORMS ACTIVE NORTH OF SAINT CROIX
